food.name: Запечённый перекус, без глютена, Grissini семена кунжута, органический, Schnitzer

serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

This product is Monash University Low FODMAP Certified™. Samples of the product were analysed and assessed to be low in FODMAP and can assist with following the Monash University Low FODMAP Diet™.
serves.title: 1 порция

This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS. This food remains low in FODMAPs in a serving size of up to 500 grams.

Please note that this food is high in fat. Fat can affect gut motility and when consumed in excess can be an additional symptom trigger.
